articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Neil Lennon has cast doubts over whether Kyogo Furuhashi would be capable of playing regularly for Tottenham amid reports that Ange Postecoglou could make a move for the Celtic striker.
articles.title: Former Celtic manager insists Kyogo 'not a top end EPL player' amid Spurs links

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou has completed his first major transfer deal as Tottenham manager with the signing of James Maddison from Leicester City.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou secures major Tottenham signing as former Celtic boss lands £40m target

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Between them, Celtic and Rangers have so far signed five players ahead of the new season. More recruits are expected to be confirmed imminently as the teams look to duke it out in the Premiership and progress in Europe.
articles.title: Old Firm transfers: £7m ace set for Rangers medical, Celtic agree 2nd signing, Ibrox target attracts attention

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: One of the most eagerly-anticipated dates in the summer Scottish football calendar takes place at the end of the week with the release of the fixtures for the 2023/24 SPFL season.
articles.title: SPFL Fixture List 2023/24 - Release date, how they are compiled, winter break, Celtic and Hibs expectation

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: When Celtic sold Josip Juranovic to Union Berlin for £7.5m in January it was clear that they had already secured a ready-made replacement for less than half the price.
articles.title: Alistair Johnston lifts lid on his Celtic 'struggles' that were hidden from the 'outside world'

articles.author: Chris Andrews
articles.description: Kieran Tierney would be open to Celtic return this summer if he was to leave Arsenal.
articles.title: Kieran Tierney: Arsenal star 'open' to shock Celtic return, £120k-a-week wages, Newcastle United link

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Rangers star Todd Cantwell has poked fun at former Celtic striker Chris Sutton with a seven-word put down on Twitter.
articles.title: Rangers star skewers ex-Celtic hero Chris Sutton with seven-word put down of pundit

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The transfer window has been open for nearly two weeks for Scottish sides. Fans of some teams will already be growing frustrated about the lack of activity but clubs have until September 1 to get business done.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Rangers favourite linked with shock move, Celtic target admission, Hearts in winger battle

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Across the past week Scottish Premiership clubs have been returning to pre-season ahead of the new league season which begins on the weekend of August 5. What exactly are the 12 top-flight clubs’ plans across the coming weeks? The Scotsman takes a look at the training camps, tours and friendly matches sides have lined up.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership pre-season: Celtic's exciting tour, Rangers set for bumper Ibrox crowds, all fixtures

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Tottenham have announced Ange Postecoglou’s coaching staff after he failed in a bid to take his former Celtic assistants with him.
articles.title: Tottenham confirm Ange Postecoglou's coaching staff including former Celtic assistant

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: The last man to take the Scotland men’s team to a World Cup. This achievement alone would have ensured a slew of tributes.
articles.title: Craig Brown was much more than the last man to take Scotland to a World Cup: dignity could have been his middle name

articles.author: Pat Nevin
articles.description: I would never have been a professional footballer without Craig Brown. It really is that simple.
articles.title: Craig Brown telegram gesture Pat Nevin won't ever forget: 'How many managers would do that?

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Former Scotland boss Craig Brown’s death aged 82 following a short illness has led to a flood of tributes from around Scottish football and beyond. The ex-Aberdeen and Motherwell manager was the last man to lead the national team to a World Cup and he holds the record for the number of international matches managed by a Scotland coach.
articles.title: Craig Brown: What former players, colleagues and friends said about one of Scottish football's greatest icons

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish football has been paying tribute to one of its most popular, beloved and respected figures Craig Brown following his death on Monday aged 82.
articles.title: Craig Brown: Scotland legend dies aged 82 as tributes flood in for ex-Aberdeen and Motherwell boss

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Former Celtic forward Robbie Keane has made a surprise managerial move, taking over Israeli giants Maccabi Tel Aviv.
articles.title: Ex-Celtic star in surprise managerial move, Israeli giants, link-up with former Parkhead favourite

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Livingston boss David Martindale has admitted he expects to sell Joel Nouble before the start of the league season.
articles.title: Livingston boss reveals when Joel Nouble could be sold, £1m valuation and why he could play Premier League

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: By the end of the week all 12 Scottish Premiership sides are expected to be back for pre-season before heading off to Europe and beyond for training camps or tours. Managers will be keen to bring in signings across the coming days and weeks.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Serie A side want Celtic ace, Rangers to sign €8m forward, Aberdeen eye 2nd Liverpool deal

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Scottish football can feel far removed from the inner sanctums where the strategic planning happens at the top end across the continent.
articles.title: How Celtic's Peter Lawwell helped save football from Super League - and the growing influence of Rangers at Europe's top table

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: With the new campaign not for away, Celtic and Rangers are ramping up their transfer activity in their bid to become the dominant force in Scottish football next season...
articles.title: Old Firm transfers: Celtic to swoop for striker after Rangers rejection - but £7m forward set for Ibrox 'this week'

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: It is not heretical to suggest Celtic supporters could find more favour with the credo expressed by Brendan Rodgers than predecessor Ange Postecoglou over the club’s playing approach in European competition.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers breaks with Ange Postecoglou over Celtic's approach in Europe - 'I won't be averse to a bit of pragmatism'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The transfer window has been open for less than two weeks but cinch Premiership sides have already been active, some more than others. In total 26 signings have been confirmed. Many of the names are familiar to Scottish football fans but there are some who will be new to the game north of the border. The Scotsman looks at some of those newcomers and what we can expect...
articles.title: 5 most interesting Premiership newcomers - Celtic's in-demand star, €9m Rangers striker, Hibs & Aberdeen recruits

articles.description: "The coach told me the keeper is so important with his attacking mentality. It's a position with big responsibilities because if you make a mistake it's 99% likely to be a goal. I love this responsibility.
articles.title: What ex-Celtic boss Postecoglou told Spurs signing about goalkeepers

articles.description: Gallagher is a Northern Ireland U18 international, so is highly rated by his country.

articles.description: The Aussie is set to add to his Spurs squad ahead of starting in the job on July 1.

articles.description: Yang Hyun-jun has admitted he could be forced to wait until the winter transfer window to seal a dream move to Celtic.

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur have confirmed Ange Postecoglou's backroom staff.

articles.description: He told Record Sport: “Brendan will bring in his own players, some managers inherit a squad and don’t have the budget to change things but the opposite is true at Celtic. He’s coming in with the intention of bringing new faces in and he’ll want two or three into the building who are his type of player. He’ll also tweak things slightly. Ange was stubborn with his 4-3-3 and was very successful with that.
articles.title: Further Brendan Rodgers Celtic protest banners predicted

articles.description: Tottenham are set to table a formal offer for James Maddison - but it's initially £20 short of Leicester's valuation.

articles.description: Celtic midfielder Reo Hatate has been linked with a move to Al Ittihad in Saudi Arabia.

articles.title: Celtic & Rangers values ranked in Premiership MVP list

articles.description: It has been theorised for some time that the Hoops hero has a Twitter account and uses it to defend his record while as manager of the club.
articles.title: Neil Lennon rubbishes Celtic 'burner' account claims

articles.description: The teaser images seem to confirm that the 'snakeskin' pattern will feature on the latest edition of the club's green and white hooped top.
articles.title: Celtic 'snake' pattern leak confirmed by club in kit teaser

articles.description: The Aussie made the move to the Premier League giants after securing a treble with Celtic last season.
articles.title: Postecoglou set for Spurs transfer chaos after behind the scenes move

articles.description: Simon Jordan reckons Brendan Rodgers must follow the European standards set by Rangers in recent seasons.

articles.description: The Aussie is aiming to put his stamp on Spurs ahead of the new season.
articles.title: Postecoglou and Spurs set for £60m transfer hijack for key target

articles.description: Stephen Welsh is reportedly a transfer target for Hellas Verona with Bologna also moniotoring the central defender.
articles.title: Celtic defender emerges as transfer target for Serie A clubs

articles.description: Yang Hyun-jun has demanded he be allowed to move to Celtic this summer.
articles.title: Yang demands to be allowed to complete Celtic transfer switch

articles.description: Back in 2017 the Celtic support believed that Brendan Rodgers walked on water after the former Liverpool manager put himself in the history books by claiming a first-ever Invincible treble immediately after arriving in Glasgow.
articles.title: Lennon makes Rodgers title prediction in fan forgiveness statement

articles.description: After guiding Leicester City to a Europa Conference League semi-final last year, Brendan Rodgers now has a taste for success on the European stage.

articles.description: Never mind ten in a row - Neil Lennon believes that Celtic would be attempting to win a 13th consecutive Premiership title next season if it hadn’t been for the coronavirus.
articles.title: Neil Lennon makes Celtic Covid claim in 13-in-a-row statement

articles.description: After the Aussie's move from Glasgow to London, star duo Kyogo Furuhashi and Reo Hatate have already been heavily linked to Spurs.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou and Spurs 'targeting third Celtic transfer'

articles.description: The Japanese international is a wanted man after a stunning treble-winning campaign for the Hoops.
articles.title: Kyogo's Celtic price tag detailed as Postecoglou plots Tottenham raid

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers insists James Forrest still has a big future at Celtic, despite game time being limited last term.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers offers James Forrest Celtic future clue

articles.description: The Japanese international has been in stunning form since moving to Scotland under Ange Postecoglou in 2021.
articles.title: Burnley eye Kyogo transfer deal amid Ange Postecoglou Spurs link

articles.description: BRENDAN Rodgers has admitted he is relishing the prospect of coming up against Michael Beale next season and predicted the challenge of beating his former colleague’s new-look Rangers team to silverware will bring out the best in him at Celtic.
articles.title: I'll relish playing Michael Beale's new Rangers, says Brendan Rodgers
